adverbs.description: urgently (comparative more urgently, superlative most urgently)

entries.meaning: With great haste, with a sense of urgency, because it is very important.
examples: We all urgently need to apply solutions to the problem of pollution.
Funds are urgently required if this work is to be completed as planned.
He pleaded urgently for release from what he considered to be an unjust imprisonment.
